name: Honey Bee
description: A basic cheap subscription plan with both direct and group messenger functions and a basic encryption algorithm.

name: Silver Bee
description: An optimal subscription solution with balanced price and security. Group chats + p2p messenger backed with a two-layer encryption.

name: Queen Bee
description: Top level subscription with top security. Group chats, p2p messenger, triple encryption.

name: Jade Wasp
description: Basic encrypted messenger. Simple security, cheapest plan. First month for free.

name: Ruby Wasp
description: Advanced messenger sub. 2-level security, optimal price. Rubies get to participate in group chats if invited by Bees.

name: Purple Hornet
description: Pro-tier messenger with a top security level. Purple hornets are allowed to join any number of group chats if invited by bees.
